headline: QXO Is Raising Another $1.8 Billion for Its M&A War Chest
summary: Building-supplies company  QXO  could be moving closer to making another big acquisition.  The firm, led by serial entrepreneur Brad Jacobs, announced Monday that it is raising an additional $1.8 billion in financing for possible takeover offers.  Shares of QXO had been up 3% in early trading Monday.

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Home Depot (HD) After Recent Valuation Signals
summary: Now that we have set the scene for Home Depot, the next step is to unpack what today’s share price is actually asking you to pay for, and how that compares under different valuation lenses. In this section, we will walk through several common approaches that investors use to assess whether a stock looks expensive or reasonable, including market based multiples and cash flow based methods. Each method highlights a different part of the story. Instead of treating any single model as a verdict,...

headline: How Home Depot, Wayfair executives are preparing for an agentic AI future
summary: The technology is redefining how customers interact with brands, but at least some parts of shopping will remain a human experience, executives said Sunday at NRF.

headline: Trump Housing Plan Sends Home Depot Stock Higher
summary: Home Depot Inc (NYSE:HD) is trading sharply higher Friday afternoon as investors bet that a new White House housing initiative will unlock fresh demand for home improvement spending. Here’s what investors need to know. Lower Mortgage Rates Aim To Break...
